segment.source: Description: When submitting an IAP, the info you enter in s step will be displayed to your app's customers.
segment.target: Description: When submitting an IAP, the info you enter in s step will be displayed to your app's customers.

segment.source: title: Create IAP descriptions
segment.target: title: Create IAP descriptions

segment.source: Create IAP descriptions
segment.target: Create IAP descriptions

segment.source: When submitting an IAP, the info you enter in Descriptions step will be displayed to your app's customers.
segment.target: When submitting an IAP, the info you enter in Descriptions step will be displayed to your app's customers.

segment.source: Make sure to consider the description carefully in order to represent your IAP accurately in a way that makes it appealing to customers.
segment.target: Make sure to consider the description carefully in order to represent your IAP accurately in a way that makes it appealing to customers.

segment.source: You can customize the description for each language in which you offer your app.
segment.target: You can customize the description for each language in which you offer your app.

segment.source: Languages
segment.target: Languages

segment.source: Before you can enter description info, you need to specify one or more languages.
segment.target: Before you can enter description info, you need to specify one or more languages.

segment.source: We recommend providing descriptions for every language your app supports.
segment.target: We recommend providing descriptions for every language your app supports.

segment.source: Under the Descriptions section of your IAP’s submission, click Add languages.
segment.target: Under the Descriptions section of your IAP’s submission, click Add languages.

segment.source: Choose one or more languages from the list and then click Save at the bottom of the page.
segment.target: Choose one or more languages from the list and then click Save at the bottom of the page.

segment.source: You’ll then see these languages listed in the Add languages section.
segment.target: You’ll then see these languages listed in the Add languages section.

segment.source: Click the language name to provide description info for that language.
segment.target: Click the language name to provide description info for that language.

segment.source: You can add additional languages later by clicking Add languages again.
segment.target: You can add additional languages later by clicking Add languages again.

segment.source: Title
segment.target: Title

segment.source: This is the name your customers will see for this IAP.
segment.target: This is the name your customers will see for this IAP.

segment.source: Enter a name of up to 100 characters.
segment.target: Enter a name of up to 100 characters.

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: If you'd like to display more info than just a title, you can enter up to 200 characters here.
segment.target: If you'd like to display more info than just a title, you can enter up to 200 characters here.

segment.source: This field is optional.
segment.target: This field is optional.

segment.source: Icon
segment.target: Icon

segment.source: You also have the option to provide an image that may be displayed when the user buys the product.
segment.target: You also have the option to provide an image that may be displayed when the user buys the product.

segment.source: This icon must be a .png file that measures exactly 300 x 300 pixels.
segment.target: This icon must be a .png file that measures exactly 300 x 300 pixels.
